did.abstract: Papers of a soldier in the Allied intervention in Russia, 1918-1920, the "Polar Bear Expedition."

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The collection was donated by Frances Lovett, of Lafayette, Colorado, in 2007 (Donor no. 9926).

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

prefercite.p: [item], folder title, box no., C.E. Riordan papers, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: Served with the U.S. Army Judge Advocate General's Dept. during the American intervention at Archangel, Russia.

scopecontent.p: Letters describing Riodan's experiences in Russia.
